scripts.deploy: npm run build && wrangler pages deploy dist
scripts.deploy:badminton: npm run build:badminton && wrangler pages deploy dist --project-name badminton-tournament
scripts.deploy:tennis: npm run build:tennis && wrangler pages deploy dist --project-name tennis-tournament
scripts.dev:badminton: SPORT=badminton npm run build && wrangler pages dev dist --d1=sport-production --local --ip 0.0.0.0 --port 3000
scripts.dev:tennis: SPORT=tennis npm run build && wrangler pages dev dist --d1=sport-production --local --ip 0.0.0.0 --port 3000
scripts.db:reset: rm -rf .wrangler/state/v3/d1 && npm run db:migrate:local && npm run db:seed
